name: Catch Breadcrumb
author: Catch Plugins

sections.description: Catch Breadcrumb is a simple yet feature-rich breadcrumb WordPress plugin that adds seamless breadcrumbs navigation to your website. The plugin provides customization options, with which you can tweak the settings according to your website. Catch Breadcrumb is extremely lightweight, provides a responsive design and comes with features such as shortcode options, breadcrumb selector, separator, and more. With these features available in the plugin, you can display the breadcrumb trail wherever you wish. Additionally, with the new WordPress plugin for breadcrumbs, you have the option to whether or not display the breadcrumb on the homepage of your website. Checkmark the homepage option in the settings page if you want the breadcrumb to display in the homepage. Add sophisticated breadcrumb trails with Catch Breadcrumb and make your website elegant looking and user-friendly.
sections.installation:
The easy way (via Dashboard) :

  • Go to Plugins > Add New
  • Type in the Catch Breadcrumb in Search Plugins box
  • Click Install Now to install the plugin
  • After Installation click activate to start using the Catch Breadcrumb
  • Go to Catch Breadcrumb from Dashboard menu

Not so easy way (via FTP) :

  • Download the Catch Breadcrumb
  • Unarchive Catch Breadcrumb plugin
  • Copy folder with catch-breadcrumb.zip
  • Open the ftp \wp-content\plugins\
  • Paste the plug-ins folder in the folder
  • Go to admin panel => open item “Plugins” => activate Catch Breadcrumb
  • Go to Catch Breadcrumb from Dashboard menu

  • Added: Display Breadcrumb options to display the breadcrumb before and after the selector

  • Compatibility check up to version 5.3

1.3 (Released: May 07, 2019)

  • Bug Fixed: Undefined index breadcrumb_home_icon
  • Compatibility check up to version 5.2

1.2 (Released: February 21, 2019)

  • Compatibility check up to version 5.1

1.1 (Released: December 12, 2018)

  • Added: Catch Themes and Catch Plugins tabs in Add themes and Add plugins page respectively
  • Added: Themes by Catch Themes section under Themes panel in customizer
  • Compatibility check up to version 5.0

1.0.2 (Released: November 26, 2018)

1.0.1 (Released: November 16, 2018)

  • Added Home Icon
  • Bug Fixed: Too few parameters in get_month_link
  • Support WooCommerce breadcrumb

1.0.0 (Released: September 21, 2018)

  • Initial release

short_description: Catch Breadcrumb lets you display Breadcrumb Navigation anywhere on your website elegantly.
